data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Martins, Luciana, Tavares, Marcos (2019): Two new species of Sclerothyone from the southwestern Atlantic Ocean, with a key to genera and species of Sclerothyoninae (Holothuroidea: Dendrochirotida: Sclerodactylidae). Zootaxa 4658 (2): 375-382, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4658.2.11|6 occurrences
